Name: Image.Hue
Desc: Shifts the hue of the image by a specified angle.
LongDesc: The Hue method rotates the hue of all pixels in the image by a given angle, supporting clamping for safe color values. Useful for color correction, creative effects, and color shifting.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 300, height: 200 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Hue(90); });
